docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Supreme Court ruled today that recipients of Federal money may not discriminate against people who are physically or mentally impaired by contagious diseases. Although the decision involved a schoolteacher suffering from tuberculosis, it could benefit many victims of AIDS.
